## Interval.distance() method

Returns the distance between intervals, or zero if they touch or overlap.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
distance(i: Readonly<Interval>): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  i | <code>Readonly&lt;Interval&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`
